Implementation_Steps: * If  Non-Jackson datacenter, Razor/CASPR is used to provision host. Switch server to use CASPR by modifying the DHCP entry through ddi command, add it to CASPR group and remove from RAZOR group.
* search record - ddi search txt record my-host1-1-site.dhcp.ops.sfdc.net
* Edit record - ddi edit txt record my-host1-1-site.dhcp.ops.sfdc.net -T 'mac=54:9f:35:18:dc:6e group=caspr'.
* Verify record - ddi search txt record my-host1-1-site.dhcp.ops.sfdc.net
* Use AFW_Razor_Basic_HostBuild WF to rebuild the server.
* Add server back to BigIP pool
